## Great Job!
StoryMaker has plenty of lessons to help you learn more about topics related to this path.
learning_guide_2::clip_photo_3::goals[0]: Capture your character doing an action related to the story.

learning_guide_2::text_card_3::text: Good. Now let's add clips to support the Character's story. With the next two clip cards, add an action and result.
learning_guide_2::markdown_card_0::text:
## Creating a detailed, complete story often requires more than three clips. In addition to using multiple character, action and result clips, many stories include two more elements:  

• Place  

If your character will be in many places, use place clips to show the change.  

• Signature  

You may want to show a specific, signature element of your character or story. Signature clips are meant to emphasize a key point of your story.
learning_guide_2::clip_video_3::goals[1]: Show something important about your character.
